price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߘߴߏ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߣߊߞߐ ߘߐ߫ ، ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߓߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߛߊ߫߹
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
